item.title: Venn Pie-agram
item.description: Hereâ€™s the Venn Pie-agram I made to celebrate Pi(e) Day 2019. Flavors are cherry, apple, and cherry apple! library(magick) ## Linking to ImageMagick 6.9.9.14 ## Enabled features: cairo, freetype, fftw, ghostscript, lcms, pango, rsvg, webp ## Disabled features: fontconfig, x11 pie <- image_read("https://github.com/MirandaTilton/MirandaTilton.github.io/raw/master/post/0313190900b_2.jpg") pie

item.title: Code Demo
item.description: Bash #!/bin/bash ###### CONFIG ACCEPTED_HOSTS="/root/.hag_accepted.conf" BE_VERBOSE=false if [ "$UID" -ne 0 ] then echo "Superuser rights required" exit 2 fi genApacheConf(){ echo -e "# Host ${HOME_DIR}$1/$2 :" } CoffeeScript grade = (student, period=(if b? then 7 else 6)) -> if student.excellentWork "A+" else if student.okayStuff if student.triedHard then "B" else "B-" else "C" class Animal extends Being constructor: (@name) -> move: (meters) -> alert @name + " moved #{meters}m.

item.title: Hello R Markdown
item.description: R Markdown This is an R Markdown document. Markdown is a simple formatting syntax for authoring HTML, PDF, and MS Word documents. For more details on using R Markdown see http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com. You can embed an R code chunk like this: summary(cars) ## speed dist ## Min. : 4.0 Min. : 2.00 ## 1st Qu.:12.0 1st Qu.: 26.00 ## Median :15.0 Median : 36.00 ## Mean :15.4 Mean : 42.98 ## 3rd Qu.
